# transittraj

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package for reconstructing and visualizing transit vehicle trajectories.

## Installation

You can install the development version of transittraj from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("obrien-ben/transittraj")
```

This is an early development version of `transitraj`. Expect it to change substantially without warning.

What we're working on:

- Documenting & pushing complete set of tools for cleaning AVL data
- A set of vignettes/articles with tutorials, discussion of methodologies, and example applications
- Eventual submission to CRAN
